channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: “Today'”s Dylan Dreyer and Kids Celebrate 1st Christmas Since She Announced End of 12-Year Marriage
item.description: The mom of three publicly announced she and Fichera were separating after 12 years of marriage in a July Instagram post
